name: Uranium (Killian Diboues)
description:
A fun coop game where you play two thief that steal an uranium bar without any protection.

Launch the bar to your compagnion before it's too late and try to escape the big nuclear plant.

Game by Killian DIBOUES, Tom BOUTONNAT, Victor BOUNIOL, Erwan GUILLERM, Marian ROBERT, Thomas LAHAYE
